TopicTitle: How do I install the wobbly rockets mod?

Articles.Content: I'm new to this so I have no clue
Download the files and copy them into KSP/Parts
I've downloaded a couple of mods but I have only placed one mod into the game (Small Engines). When I start the game it doesn't load fully it just gets stuck on the loading screen. Whats happening?
The mod night be outdated or u placed the files in the wrong area

I had this problem.

Remove the 'Smallengine' folder from your parts folder.

Inside this is two folders, 'microengine' and 'microtank'

These are the two folders that need to go into your parts folder.

Move these two in, should all work again.

Seems the double folder structure confuses the game.

YOu may have to extract the fiels before you put them in your parts folder

right click > Extract all
